title: Compiler panic.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I was refactoring some code when this happened. I don't know what exactly causes it so I'm attaching the project. It's not really big, 4 files, 2 are empty and the other is the lib file which just re-exports things. The code probably shouldnt work even without the compiler panic since I was just copy pasting before fixing the dependencies.

Removing `use super::*;` from the quaternion.rs file "fixes" it.

**Edit**: replacing the line above with `use super::{Matrix4, Vector3, atan2, cross};` allows the project to compile.

[math.txt](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/141434/math.txt)
(This is a zip file, I had to rename it because github wouldn't let me upload. Just rename it back to .zip)
## Meta
